title: Siphrios
description: A large Roman or late Roman fortress that was at least partly maintained into the medieval period. Known today as Rabat Kalesi, it is located to the northeast of the village of HisaraltÄ± in modern Turkey.

properties.description: Representative point location of the so-called citadel of Rabat Kalesi in Turkey, derived (after Sinclair 1989a) from analysis of Google Earth imagery. Dates after Sinclair.
properties.title: Imagery Location
